A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Absolute trash. At times I contemplated walking out of the theater\, though I instead opted to stay\, hoping the \nmovie might redeem itself. It did not. The end was equally as disappointing as the beginning and the middle. From pointless plotlines that take up the bulk of this sack of trash\, to lead characters that I genuinely found myself wanting to die. If I had the choice\, I would forget I ever saw it. This film soured me on star wars.
